thread.title: Customer Rod Miles
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer Rod Miles

author: Customer Rod Miles
title: Customer Rod Miles
text: From initial first website viewing to new tyre fitted was a pleasure. The website was very informative with prices competitive, follow up phone call from a pleasant, helpful lady to the tyre fitted by a very competent and polite young man. Great service and thank you. Would certainly use you again and recommend you to friends and family.
